channel.title: Instructions on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Instructions on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How to set up environment to edit memo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you enter the tutorial, please generate your SSH key by following this instruction. The process includes 3 steps: Create ssh key pair (public, private) Save private key to your computer Submit public key to github A.

item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A. Set up: Create an on-chain crypto wallet Install the extension on your browser Go to https://metamask.io/download/ and Click “Install Metamask for Chromium” Add the wallet extension to the Chrome on Firefox Browser (DO NOT use Safari) Follow guideline to create a wallet
